Text: That's really nice of you - but don't you mean "absense"?

This is really great.  There was an earlier version uploaded but it kept stalling on my computer and shutting itself down. Others had no problems but I sure did and this install was as smooth as silk.  Looks excellent too.
no abstinence is a word too, thanks Maxpower you can't abstain for too long hey!
